name: auth-service
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with the SAM CLI. It includes the following files and folders.

scripts.build: cd app && go build && rm app && cd .. && sam build
scripts.start: npm run build && sam local start-api
scripts.watch: nodemon -e go,graphql,yaml.json -i generated__graphql.go --signal SIGINT -x 'npm run start || exit 1'
